content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Switzerland Employee Handbook\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please find the link to our Employee Handbook here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/switzerland/zurich/introduction.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://info.epam.com/policy/switzerland/zurich/introduction.html\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Switzerland: Employee Information Site\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please visit our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UBSADMA/Employee+Information+Site\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee Information Site\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for further information about Leaves, Vacation, Salary and Paydays, FAQs and much more.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are updating the site continuously with new content. Should you have any suggestions on whatâ€™s missing feel free to send an email to: EPAM People Team CH \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:hr_ch@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"hr_ch@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and we will review your request.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
